content.question: Which of the following best describes the purpose of the imagery in the poster?

choices.label: To discourage the middle and upper classes from supporting the Nazis
To manipulate fear of spreading communism among Germany’s working class
To spread Nazi anti-Semitic and racial ideology among ordinary Germans
To exploit bitterness and insecurity in Germany’s Weimar Republic

content.answer: To exploit bitterness and insecurity in Germany’s Weimar Republic
